Callback20Header: Slay the Bishop and take the Red Chalice
Callback22Header: Speak with Sister Vera at the Bear Tribe Refuge
Name: Blood Sermon
Phase18Description: I must find the Red Chalice. This cursed item must be destroyed.
Phase23Description: I should return the Red Chalice to Sister Vera. She will know what to do with this cursed Red Chalice and the evil it can create.
Phase24Description: I must venture into the forbidden Sanguine Chapel and find the Red Chalice. This cursed item must be destroyed.
Toast: Venture into the Sanguine Chapel and find the Red Chalice.
